00021 inline static void DrawTextCenter(wxDC &dc, wxCoord x, wxCoord y, wxString text)
00022 {
00023         wxSize textExtent = dc.GetTextExtent(text);
00024 
00025         x -= textExtent.x / 2;
00026         y -= textExtent.y / 2;
00027 
00028         dc.DrawText(text, x, y);
00029 }

00037 inline static void DrawTextCenter(wxDC &dc, wxRect &rc, wxString text)
00038 {
00039         wxSize textExtent = dc.GetTextExtent(text);
00040 
00041         wxCoord x = rc.x + (rc.GetWidth() - textExtent.x) / 2;
00042         wxCoord y = rc.y + (rc.GetHeight() - textExtent.y) / 2;
00043 
00044         dc.DrawText(text, x, y);
00045 }

00047 inline static void CheckFixRect(wxRect &rc)
00048 {
00049         if (rc.x < 0)
00050                 rc.x = 0;
00051         if (rc.y < 0)
00052                 rc.y = 0;
00053         if (rc.width < 0)
00054                 rc.width = 0;
00055         if (rc.height < 0)
00056                 rc.height = 0;
00057 }

00062 inline static void Margins(wxRect &rc, wxCoord left, wxCoord top, wxCoord right, wxCoord bottom)
00063 {
00064         if ((left + right) > rc.width) {
00065                 rc.x = left;
00066                 rc.width = 0; //XXX
00067         }
00068         else {
00069                 rc.x += left;
00070                 rc.width -= (left + right);
00071         }
00072 
00073         if ((top + bottom) > rc.height) {
00074                 rc.y = top;
00075                 rc.height = 0; //XXX
00076         }
00077         else {
00078                 rc.y += top;
00079                 rc.height -= (top + bottom);
00080         }
00081 
00082         CheckFixRect(rc);
00083 }

00085 inline static void SetupRect(wxRect &rc, wxCoord x0, wxCoord y0, wxCoord x1, wxCoord y1)
00086 {
00087         if (x0 < x1) {
00088                 rc.x = x0;
00089                 rc.width = x1 - x0;
00090         }
00091         else {
00092                 rc.x = x1;
00093                 rc.width = x0 - x1;
00094         }
00095 
00096         if (y0 < y1) {
00097                 rc.y = y0;
00098                 rc.height = y1 - y0;
00099         }
00100         else {
00101                 rc.y = y1;
00102                 rc.height = y0 - y1;
00103         }
00104 }
